resources.string: WhatsApp
MODs
Privacy
Click to modify your privacy preferences.
Media MODs
Click to modify your media preferences.
Hide Last Seen
Pause your last seen and stop being shown online. \nNote\: You cannot see your contact\'s last seen.
Blue Tick on Reply
Show sender that you read the message only after you reply. \nNote: You need to enable Hide Blue Tick first.
Anti Revoke
Prevent a message/media from getting deleted and show it with a special indicator.
Hide Forwarded Tag
Prevent a message/media from being shown as forwarded by you.
Hide Status View
Don\'t tell your contact that you have seen their status.
Hide Blue Tick
Don\'t tell the sender that you have read their message.
Hide Double Tick
Don\'t tell the sender that you have received their message.
Hide Play Icon
Don\'t tell the sender that you played their audio message.
Hide Typing
Don\'t tell the sender that you are typing a message.
Hide Recording
Don\'t tell sender that you are recording an audio.
Reset Privacy
Click to clear all privacy preferences and reset to default.
All Privacy preferences are cleared now.
Status Image Quality
Set the compression ratio for the media you upload in status.
Maximum Status Image Size
Choose the maximum image size you can upload.
Status Video Maximum Duration
Choose the maximum duration of video you can upload. Normal users can see only up to 45 seconds.
Maximum Image Size
Choose the maximum size of image you can send.
Image Quality
Choose the compression level for media you send.
Maximum Image Resolution
Choose the maximum resolution for images you send.
Update to new version is successful.
